name: ShieldActionDelegate
desc: A class for an extension that handles shield actions.

items.name: enum ShieldAction
items.desc: Constants that describe a userâ€™s action for your extension to handle.

items.name: enum ShieldActionResponse
items.desc: Constants your extension that handles shield actions can use to tell the system how to respond to an action.

items.name: func handle(action: ShieldAction, for: ApplicationToken, completionHandler: (ShieldActionResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Allows the extension to respond to a user action when the system displays a shield over an application.

items.name: func handle(action: ShieldAction, for: WebDomainToken, completionHandler: (ShieldActionResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Allows the extension to respond to a user action when the system displays a shield over a website.

items.name: func handle(action: ShieldAction, for: ActivityCategoryToken, completionHandler: (ShieldActionResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Allows the extension to respond to a user action when the system displays a shield over an application or website because of its category.
